Beware of tour guides that purchase the entrance tickets to local monuments during the tour for you and pay the local rate but charge you the foreign rate rather purchase the ticket yourself and pocket the rest between themselves and the person issuing the ticket .####Beware=O of=O tour=T-POS guides=T-NEG that=O purchase=O the=O entrance=O tickets=O to=O local=O monuments=O during=O the=O tour=O for=O you=O and=O pay=O the=O local=O rate=O but=O charge=O you=O the=O foreign=O rate=O rather=O purchase=O the=O ticket=O yourself=O and=O pocket=O the=O rest=O between=O themselves=O and=O the=O person=O issuing=O the=O ticket=O .=O 
Also when shopping ( and this is throughout India ) if a tour guide or driver takes you , they get a 40-50 % commission which is worked into the price you pay .####Also=O when=O shopping=O (=O and=O this=O is=O throughout=O India=O )=O if=O a=O tour=T-POS guide=T-NEG or=O driver=T-NEG takes=O you=O ,=O they=O get=O a=O 40-50=O %=O commission=O which=O is=O worked=O into=O the=O price=O you=O pay=O .=O

The restoration work continues and there are many building near their original configuration .####The=O restoration=T-POS work=T-POS continues=O and=O there=O are=O many=O building=O near=O their=O original=O configuration=O .=O 
If you get the chance you have to go .####If=O you=O get=O the=O chance=O you=O have=O to=O go=O .=O

Taj Mahal was built in the 17th century by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan as a tomb and memorial for his wife Mumtaz Mahal .####Taj=O Mahal=O was=O built=O in=O the=O 17th=O century=O by=O the=O Mughal=O emperor=O Shah=O Jahan=O as=O a=O tomb=O and=O memorial=O for=O his=O wife=O Mumtaz=O Mahal=O .=O 
He had plans to build a black Taj Mahal on the other side of the river for himself , but he was imprisoned by his own son and locked away in Agra Fort , where lived for another 18 years up until his death .####He=O had=O plans=O to=O build=O a=O black=O Taj=O Mahal=O on=O the=O other=O side=O of=O the=O river=O for=O himself=O ,=O but=O he=O was=O imprisoned=O by=O his=O own=O son=O and=O locked=O away=O in=O Agra=O Fort=O ,=O where=O lived=O for=O another=O 18=O years=O up=O until=O his=O death=O .=O 
He was then laid to rest next to his wife inside Taj Mahal .####He=O was=O then=O laid=O to=O rest=O next=O to=O his=O wife=O inside=O Taj=O Mahal=O .=O 
We visited in April .####We=O visited=O in=O April=O .=O

In my opinion , although the building is impressive to witness once inside , there is barely any historical information about the place unless you want to pay for an audio guide and the amount of people inside makes it hard to appreciate the place .####In=O my=O opinion=O ,=O although=O the=O building=T-POS is=O impressive=O to=O witness=O once=O inside=O ,=O there=O is=O barely=O any=O historical=O information=O about=O the=O place=O unless=O you=O want=O to=O pay=O for=O an=O audio=O guide=O and=O the=O amount=T-POS of=T-POS people=T-NEG inside=O makes=O it=O hard=O to=O appreciate=O the=O place=O .=O
